title: Komagene
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish
description: Part of franchise sandwich chain restaurants. Offers chee koefte, a Turkish vegan sandwich. Certified as vegan include: cig kofte (bulgur and nuts), biber dolmasi (pepper), patlican dolmasi (aubergine), yaprak sarma (stuffed vine leaves), and saksuka (grilled veggies). At this outlet you could get the mild version of cig kofte and top with all kinds of greens and pickles.
